document.full_text: portugal holds a snap general election on sunday, which could end months of political and economic turmoil as the next government gets down to enacting tough austerity under a 78-billion-euro bailout.
document.title: portugal votes under bailout cloud, centre-right ahead
lines_and_colors: portugal holds a snap general election on sunday, which could end months of political and economic turmoil as the next government gets down to enacting tough austerity under a 78-billion-euro bailout.
